title: Dislike new HUD...plz nerf
body:
I think the new HUD gave me cancer, The colours feel so off and the positioning of our team portraits just feels like they had no where to put it so they shoved into a corner above the minimap.

On a more serious note id be happy if riot gave us the choice to use the old or new HUD.

replies.body:
Do your homework before you rant and complain, 
follow the link. Explaining exactly why things, have been put where they have.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/game-features/hud-update

Rant and Complaining ? OH i didnt realize expressing my own opinion regarding the new HUD made you so upset to make such drastic assumptions. Its like we aren't allowed to criticise  the new HUD or anything else.

> [{quoted}](name=mr roflmao,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TdVluvAL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-24T04:30:25.827+0000)
>
> Rant and Complaining ? OH i didnt realize expressing my own opinion regarding the new HUD made you so upset to make such drastic assumptions. Its like we aren't allowed to criticise  the new HUD or anything else.

You have totally missed the point my friend, you've misunderstood and misspoke. 
give feedback sure, but don't say things like 'I think the new HUD gave me cancer' 
Riot have told us why, they've updated the game the way they have, all you have to do is listen instead of being insensitive.
